title: Circulation of small ruminant lentivirus in endangered goat and sheep breeds of Southern Italy
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Angela Ostuni, Sara Albarella, Luca Tassoni, Mariagiulia Pugliano, Emanuele D'Anza, Maria Antonietta Crudele, Francesca Ciotola, Maria Serena Beato, Valentina Iovane, Stefano Cecchini Gualandi, Raffaele Frontoso, Jolanda De Vendel, Vincenzo Peretti, Alfonso Bavoso
